Problem 1 - bÂ¶

Set \(U\) = 1, \(\Gamma\) = 0.1, and \(Q\) = 0. Use TDMA to find \(\phi\). Plot \(\phi\) vs. \(x\) on the same graph using grid sizes of \(N\) = 10, 20, 30, 40, 50 and compare your result to the analytical solution.
